summary: Men's shoe collection web app with brand-name styles, now focused on image-heavy display without shoe names
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Men's branded athletic sneaker in side profile view (shoe-6.dim_800x800.png)
- Men's branded running shoe in three-quarter view (shoe-7.dim_800x800.png)
- Men's branded casual leather shoe in front view (shoe-8.dim_800x800.png)
- Men's branded high-top sneaker in side view (shoe-9.dim_800x800.png)
- Men's branded slip-on shoe in three-quarter view (shoe-10.dim_800x800.png)
- Men's branded dress shoe in side profile (shoe-11.dim_800x800.png)
- Men's branded sports shoe in dynamic angle (shoe-12.dim_800x800.png)

existing_features.title: Remove the shoe name text (e.g., 'Adidas Ultraboost', 'Nike Air Max') from all shoe cards in the gallery display while keeping the images visible
Add 7 additional men's branded shoe product images to the gallery, maintaining the current luxury aesthetic and 2-column grid layout
